title: [K-12] Cognitive Load Management Strategies for Students with Learning Disabilities Using Intelligent Tutoring Agents

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in digital device utilization and foundational understanding of language learning
context.additional_context: Customized cognitive load management program for adult learners with dyslexia or language learning difficulties.

learning_goals: Learners can reduce extraneous cognitive load by 30% during language learning processes with support from an intelligent tutoring agent.
Learners can demonstrate significant learning performance improvement (over 20%) in post-learning assessments.
Learners can articulate three or more strategies for improving learning approaches based on their experiences interacting with an agent.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
